Drivers are like translators between Windows and your devices. Your printer driver translates 'print this' into language your printer understands. Bad drivers can be like evil translators that lie to both sides!

In this lesson, we'll learn about windows driver security in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
